info.title: Jentic Generated Arazzo Specification
info.description: Automatically generated Arazzo specification from OpenAPI

workflows.summary: Retrieves the user's AdSense accounts and generates a customizable performance report (e.g., daily earnings) for a selected account.
workflows.description: Retrieves the user's AdSense accounts and generates a customizable performance report (e.g., daily earnings) for a selected account.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Generates a performance report for the specified account with selected metrics and dimensions.

workflows.summary: Retrieves the user's AdSense accounts and generates a customizable performance report in CSV format for download and offline analysis.
workflows.description: Retrieves the user's AdSense accounts and generates a customizable performance report in CSV format for download and offline analysis.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Generates a performance report in CSV format for the specified account.

workflows.summary: Checks an AdSense account for any alerts (e.g., payment holds) and policy violations that might affect ad serving or earnings.
workflows.description: Checks an AdSense account for any alerts (e.g., payment holds) and policy violations that might affect ad serving or earnings.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Lists alerts for the specified account.
Lists policy issues associated with the specified account.

workflows.summary: Fetches the list of past payments and current unpaid earnings for an AdSense account.
workflows.description: Fetches the list of past payments and current unpaid earnings for an AdSense account.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Lists paid and unpaid payments for the specified account.

workflows.summary: Identifies ad units within an AdSense account and generates a report showing performance metrics broken down by ad unit.
workflows.description: Identifies ad units within an AdSense account and generates a report showing performance metrics broken down by ad unit.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Lists ad clients (products like AdSense for Content) for the account.
Lists ad units for a specific ad client.
Generates a performance report dimensioned by ad unit.

workflows.summary: Identifies the user's sites within an AdSense account and generates a report showing performance metrics broken down by site.
workflows.description: Identifies the user's sites within an AdSense account and generates a report showing performance metrics broken down by site.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Lists all sites associated with the specified AdSense account.
Generates a performance report dimensioned by site.

workflows.summary: Finds a specific ad unit within an account and retrieves its ad code snippet for placement on a website.
workflows.description: Finds a specific ad unit within an account and retrieves its ad code snippet for placement on a website.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Lists ad clients for the account.
Lists ad units for a specific ad client.
Gets the ad code snippet for a specific ad unit.

workflows.summary: Lists previously saved report configurations for an account and generates one of them, potentially overriding the date range.
workflows.description: Lists previously saved report configurations for an account and generates one of them, potentially overriding the date range.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Lists saved reports for the specified account.
Generates a report based on a saved report configuration.

workflows.summary: Fetches the Ad Blocking Recovery tag and error protection code for an account to help publishers recover revenue lost to ad blockers.
workflows.description: Fetches the Ad Blocking Recovery tag and error protection code for an account to help publishers recover revenue lost to ad blockers.

steps.description: Lists all AdSense accounts available to the user.
Gets the ad blocking recovery tag for the specified account.
